name: neo4j
description: Neo4j is an open source Graph Database. It allows you to efficiently manage highly connected data. You can access the cluster via officially supported drivers from most languages. Installation documentation can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/neo4j
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Default credentials are neo4j/dcos. Please change them on first use.
postInstallNotes:
Neo4j has been successfully installed.
Documentation can be found at https://neo4j.com/docs and https://neo4j.com/developer
postUninstallNotes: Neo4j has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to the local host volume still exists and will need to be manually removed.
